thread.title: Ivanka Trump slammed for 'tone deaf' post amid protests surrounding President Trump's immigration crackdown
thread.title_full: Ivanka Trump slammed for 'tone deaf' post amid protests surrounding President Trump's immigration crackdown

title: Ivanka Trump slammed for 'tone deaf' post amid protests surrounding President Trump's immigration crackdown
text: Ivanka Trump slammed for 'tone deaf' post amid protests surrounding President Trump's immigration crackdown Independent.ie Ivanka Trump has been slammed for sharing a "tone deaf" post hours after her father introduced his executive order curbing immigration into the United States. http://www.independent.ie/world-news/north-america/ivanka-trump-slammed-for-tone-deaf-post-amid-protests-surrounding-president-trumps-immigration-crackdown-35406590.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35406609.ece/8e1e5/AUTOCROP/h342/iv.jpg Ivanka Trump Visits "FOX & Friends" at FOX Studios on September 14, 2016 in New York City. (Photo by Ilya S. Savenok/Getty Images) Ivanka Trump has been slammed for sharing a "tone deaf" post hours after her father introduced his executive order curbing immigration into the United States.
